title: Ghanaian women wearing dresses featuring the likeness of U.S. President Barack Obama walk down the street during Obama's first visit to sub-Saharan Africa, in Ghana's capital Accra in this July 11, 2009 file photo. As Ghana awaits the first riches from one of Africa's top oil finds of the decade, expectations on the street are high and rising.   To match Feature FRONTIERS/GHANA       REUTERS/Finbarr O'Reilly/Files  (GHANA - Tags: POLITICS ENERGY SOCIETY Stock Photo - Alamy
